00039 unsigned char *packet_space = 0;
00040 bool frame_examined[NUM_FRAMES];

00059 // packet format, including Ethernet-level headers
00060 struct fadc_packet
00061 {
00062   unsigned char dest_addr[6];
00063   unsigned char src_addr[6];
00064   unsigned short protocol;
00065   unsigned short content_length;
00066   unsigned char buffer_number;
00067   unsigned char admin_message;
00068   unsigned short packet_serial;
00069 };
00070 
00071 // state associated with each board
00072 const int max_boards = 256;
00073 struct fadc_board 
00074 {
00075   bool enabled;
00076   map<int, fadc_packet *> packets;
00077   int start_packet;
00078   int stop_packet;
00079   int first_packet;
00080   double first_packet_time;
00081   int last_packet;
00082   double last_packet_time;
00083   bool start_packet_seen;
00084   bool stop_packet_seen;
00085 };
00086 struct fadc_board board[max_boards];
00087 
00088 void receivePackets()
00089 {
00090   for(int i = 0; i < NUM_FRAMES; i++) {
00091     if(frame_examined[i]) continue;  
00092 
00093     unsigned char *frame = packet_space + i*FRAME_SIZE;
00094     struct tpacket_hdr *tph = (struct tpacket_hdr *) frame;
00095     if(!(tph->tp_status & TP_STATUS_USER)) continue;
00096 
00097     struct fadc_packet *pkt = (struct fadc_packet *) (frame + tph->tp_mac);
00098     int board_number = pkt->src_addr[5];
00099     if(!board[board_number].enabled) continue;
00100 
00101     int content_length = ntohs(pkt->content_length);
00102     int buffer_number = pkt->buffer_number;
00103     int admin_message = pkt->admin_message;
00104     int packet_serial = ntohs(pkt->packet_serial);
00105 
00106 
00107 #if 0
00108     printf("board %d length %d buffer %d admin %d serial %d\n", 
00109        board_number, content_length, buffer_number, 
00110        admin_message, packet_serial);
00111 #endif
00112 
00113     board[board_number].packets[packet_serial] = pkt;
00114     if(admin_message & 0x1) {
00115       board[board_number].start_packet = packet_serial;
00116       board[board_number].start_packet_seen = true;
00117     }
00118    if(admin_message & 0x2) {
00119      board[board_number].stop_packet = packet_serial;
00120      board[board_number].stop_packet_seen = true;
00121    }
00122 
00123    double packet_time = tph->tp_sec*1e6 + tph->tp_usec;
00124    double fpt = board[board_number].first_packet_time;
00125    if(packet_time < fpt || fpt < 0) {
00126      board[board_number].first_packet = packet_serial;
00127      board[board_number].first_packet_time = packet_time;
00128    }
00129    double lpt = board[board_number].last_packet_time;
00130    if(packet_time > lpt || lpt < 0) {
00131      board[board_number].last_packet = packet_serial;
00132      board[board_number].last_packet_time = packet_time;
00133    }
00134 
00135    frame_examined[i] = true;
00136   }
00137 }
00138 
00139 void forgetPackets()
00140 {
00141   for(int i = 0; i < max_boards; i++) {
00142     if(board[i].enabled) {
00143       board[i].packets.clear();
00144       board[i].start_packet_seen = false;
00145       board[i].stop_packet_seen = false;
00146       board[i].first_packet_time = -1;
00147     }
00148   }
00149 
00150   // release all frame buffers back to the kernel
00151   for(int i = 0; i < NUM_FRAMES; i++) {
00152     unsigned char *frame = packet_space + i*FRAME_SIZE;
00153     struct tpacket_hdr *tph = (struct tpacket_hdr *) frame;
00154     tph->tp_status = TP_STATUS_KERNEL;
00155     frame_examined[i] = false;
00156   }
00157 }
00158 
00159 bool allPacketsReceived(bool diag)
00160 {
00161   // check whether we have a start packet, a stop packet, and a stream of
00162   // continuous serial numbers in between.
00163 
00164   bool missing = false;
00165 
00166   for(int i = 0; i < max_boards; i++) {
00167     if(!board[i].enabled) continue;
00168     if(!board[i].start_packet_seen) {
00169       board[i].start_packet = board[i].first_packet;
00170 #if 0
00171       if(diag) {
00172         printf("-- board 0x%02x waiting on start packet\n", i);
00173         missing = true;
00174       } else {
00175         return false;
00176       }
00177 #endif
00178       if(diag) {
00179         printf("-- board 0x%02x workaround for missing start packet\n", i);
00180       }
00181     }
00182     if(!board[i].stop_packet_seen) {
00183       board[i].stop_packet = board[i].last_packet;
00184       if(diag) {
00185         printf("-- board 0x%02x waiting on stop packet\n", i);
00186         missing = true;
00187       } else {
00188         return false;
00189       }
00190     }
00191   }
00192   for(int i = 0; i < max_boards; i++) {
00193     if(!board[i].enabled) continue;
00194     int num_packets = board[i].stop_packet - board[i].start_packet;
00195     if(num_packets < 0) {
00196       num_packets += 0x10000;
00197     }
00198 
00199     int num_missing = 0; 
00200 #if 0
00201     if(diag) {
00202       printf("Start=%d Stop=%d\n", board[i].start_packet, board[i].stop_packet);
00203     }
00204 #endif
00205     for(int j = num_packets; j >= 0; j--) {
00206       int pn = (board[i].start_packet + j) & 0xffff;
00207       if(board[i].packets[pn] == NULL) {
00208         if(diag) {
00209 //          printf("Waiting on packet %d\n", pn);
00210           num_missing++;
00211           missing = true;
00212         } else {
00213           return false; 
00214         }
00215       }
00216     }
00217     if(diag) {
00218       printf("-- board 0x%02x waiting on %d/%d packets\n", i, 
00219         num_missing, num_packets);
00220     }
00221   }
00222   return !missing;
00223 }

00226 void setReg(char *if_name, int board, int fadc, int reg,
00227   unsigned long long value)
00228 {
00229   // look up the index of the interface
00230   int if_index = if_nametoindex(if_name);
00231   if(if_index < 0) {
00232     printf("Unknown interface %s\n", if_name);
00233     return;
00234   }
00235 
00236   struct ifreq req;
00237   strcpy(req.ifr_name, if_name);
00238   if(ioctl(packet_socket, SIOCGIFHWADDR, &req) < 0) {
00239     perror("SIOCGIFHWADDR");
00240     return;
00241   }
00242   unsigned char src[ETH_ALEN];
00243   memcpy(src, req.ifr_hwaddr.sa_data, ETH_ALEN);
00244 
00245   unsigned char dst[ETH_ALEN] = { 0x00, 0x12, 0x6d, 0x12, 0x34, 0xff};
00246   dst[5] = board;
00247   struct sockaddr_ll dstaddr;
00248   dstaddr.sll_family = AF_PACKET;
00249   dstaddr.sll_protocol = htons(ETH_P_ALL);
00250   dstaddr.sll_ifindex = if_index;
00251   dstaddr.sll_hatype = 0;
00252   dstaddr.sll_pkttype = 0;
00253   dstaddr.sll_halen = ETH_ALEN;
00254   memcpy(dstaddr.sll_addr, dst, ETH_ALEN);
00255 
00256   // format a packet
00257   unsigned char packet[512];
00258   memcpy(&packet[0], dst, ETH_ALEN);
00259   memcpy(&packet[6], src, ETH_ALEN);
00260 
00261   // protocol
00262   packet[12] = 0x0b;
00263   packet[13] = 0x04;
00264 
00265   // the content
00266   packet[14] = (fadc << 5) | reg;
00267   packet[15] = (value >> 56) & 0xff;
00268   packet[16] = (value >> 48) & 0xff;
00269   packet[17] = (value >> 40) & 0xff;
00270   packet[18] = (value >> 32) & 0xff;
00271   packet[19] = (value >> 24) & 0xff;
00272   packet[20] = (value >> 16) & 0xff;
00273   packet[21] = (value >>  8) & 0xff;
00274   packet[22] = (value      ) & 0xff;
00275 
00276   int packet_length = 512;
00277 
00278   if(sendto(packet_socket, packet, packet_length, 0, (const sockaddr *) &dstaddr, sizeof(dstaddr)) < 0) {
00279     perror("sendto");
00280   }
00281 }
00282 
00283 void setupRegs()
00284 {
00285   for(int i = 0; i < max_boards; i++) {
00286 
00287     // If no settings exist for the board, disable it.
00288     if(!odb_find_key("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x", 
00289                      crate_number, i)) {
00290       board[i].enabled = false;
00291       continue;
00292     } 
00293     printf("Found board %02x\n", i);
00294 
00295     bool enabled = 
00296       odb_get_bool("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Enabled",
00297                    crate_number, i);
00298     board[i].enabled = enabled;
00299 
00300 
00301     for(int chan = 0; chan < 8; chan++) {
00302       int led_mode = 
00303         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/LED Mode",
00304                     crate_number, i, chan);
00305 
00306       int lower_threshold = 
00307         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Lower threshold", 
00308                      crate_number, i, chan);
00309       int upper_threshold = 
00310         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Upper threshold", 
00311                     crate_number, i, chan);
00312       int pulser_period = 
00313         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Pulser period", 
00314                     crate_number, i, chan);
00315       int trigger_mask = 
00316         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Trigger mask", 
00317                     crate_number, i, chan);
00318       int presamples = 
00319         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Presamples", 
00320                     crate_number, i, chan);
00321       int stretch_samples = 
00322         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/Stretch samples", 
00323                   crate_number, i, chan);
00324       int dcm_phase =
00325         odb_get_int("/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/NFADC %02x/Channel %d/DCM phase", 
00326                   crate_number, i, chan);
00327 
00328       if(enabled) {
00329         unsigned long long r0;
00330         if(i == 0xff) {
00331           r0 = (lower_threshold & 0xfff) |
00332                ((upper_threshold & 0xfff) << 12) |
00333                ((trigger_mask & 0xf) << 24) |
00334                ((presamples & 0xf) << 28) |
00335                (((unsigned long long) (stretch_samples & 0xff)) << 32);
00336         } else {
00337           r0 = (lower_threshold & 0xfff) |
00338                ((upper_threshold & 0xfff) << 12) |
00339                ((trigger_mask & 0xf) << 24) |
00340                ((presamples & 0xfff) << 28) |
00341                (((unsigned long long) (stretch_samples & 0xfff)) << 40);
00342         }
00343         unsigned long long r1 =
00344            (pulser_period & 0xffffffff) |
00345            (((unsigned long long) (led_mode & 0xf)) << 32); 
00346         unsigned long long r2 = dcm_phase;
00347 
00348         int frontend = chan/2;
00349         if(i == 0xff) {
00350           if(frontend == 1) {
00351             frontend = 2;
00352           } else if(frontend == 2) {
00353             frontend = 1;
00354           }
00355         }
00356 
00357         if(chan % 2 == 0) { 
00358           setReg("eth1", i, frontend, 0, r0);
00359           setReg("eth1", i, frontend, 1, r1);
00360           setReg("eth1", i, frontend, 4, r2);
00361         } else {
00362           setReg("eth1", i, frontend, 2, r0);
00363           setReg("eth1", i, frontend, 3, r1);
00364           setReg("eth1", i, frontend, 5, r2);
00365         }
00366       }
00367     }
00368   }
00369 }
00370 
00371 INT new_fadc_bor()
00372 {
00373     // open a socket to receive packets for our protocol
00374     packet_socket = socket(PF_PACKET, SOCK_RAW, htons(0x0b04));
00375 
00376     if(packet_socket < 0) {
00377       perror("socket");
00378       return FE_ERR_HW;
00379     }
00380 
00381     // request that the packets be placed in a memory-mapped buffer
00382     struct tpacket_req req;
00383     req.tp_block_size = TP_BLOCK_SIZE;
00384     req.tp_block_nr = TP_NUM_BLOCKS;
00385     req.tp_frame_size = FRAME_SIZE;
00386     req.tp_frame_nr = NUM_FRAMES;
00387     int status = setsockopt(packet_socket, SOL_PACKET, PACKET_RX_RING, 
00388        (void *) &req, sizeof(req));
00389     if(status < 0) {
00390       perror("setsockopt PACKET_RX_RING");
00391       return FE_ERR_HW;
00392     }
00393 
00394     // map the buffer into our process address space
00395     packet_space = (unsigned char *) mmap(0, TP_BLOCK_SIZE*TP_NUM_BLOCKS, 
00396       PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, packet_socket, 0);
00397     if(packet_space == MAP_FAILED) {
00398       perror("mmap"); 
00399       return FE_ERR_HW;
00400     }
00401 
00402     setupRegs();
00403     forgetPackets();
00404 
00405     return SUCCESS;
00406 }
00407 
00408 INT new_fadc_eor()
00409 {
00410     if(packet_space != 0) {
00411       munmap(packet_space, TP_BLOCK_SIZE*TP_NUM_BLOCKS);
00412       packet_space = 0;
00413     }
00414     close(packet_socket);
00415     return SUCCESS;
00416 }

00418 static struct timeval tv_start;
00419 
00420 INT new_fadc_read(char *pevent)
00421 {
00422   printf("new_fadc_read\n");
00423 
00424   char bk_name[80];
00425   char *pdata;
00426 
00427   bool timed_out = false;
00428   struct timeval t1, t2;
00429   gettimeofday(&t1,0);
00430 
00431   receivePackets();
00432 
00433   while(!allPacketsReceived()) {
00434     sched_yield(); 
00435     receivePackets();
00436 
00437     gettimeofday(&t2,0);
00438     double tdiff = (t2.tv_usec-t1.tv_usec) + 1000000*(t2.tv_sec-t1.tv_sec);
00439     if(tdiff > 1000) {
00440       printf("Timed out:\n");
00441       allPacketsReceived(true);  // for diagnostic printout
00442       timed_out = true;
00443       break;
00444     }
00445   } 
00446 
00447   for(int i = 0; i < max_boards; i++) {
00448     if(board[i].enabled) {
00449       printf("Board %d: start %d (%c) - stop %d (%c)\n", i,
00450         board[i].start_packet, board[i].start_packet_seen ? '-' :  'X',
00451         board[i].stop_packet, board[i].stop_packet_seen ? '-' :  'X');
00452     }
00453   }
00454 
00455   bk_init32(pevent);
00456 
00457 //  if(!timed_out) {
00458 //    printf("Block OK\n");
00459     for(int i = 0; i < max_boards; i++) {
00460       if(!board[i].enabled) continue;
00461 
00462       for(int j = 0; j < 4; j++) {
00463         sprintf(bk_name, "N%c%02x", 'a' + j, i);
00464         bk_create(pevent, bk_name, TID_BYTE, &pdata);
00465 
00466         int num_packets = board[i].stop_packet - board[i].start_packet + 1;
00467         if(num_packets < 0) {
00468           num_packets += 0x10000;
00469         }
00470  
00471         for(int k = 0; k < num_packets; k++) {
00472           int pn = (board[i].start_packet + k) & 0xffff;
00473           struct fadc_packet *pkt = board[i].packets[pn];
00474           if(pkt) {
00475             int frontend = (pkt->buffer_number - 1) / 3;
00476             if(frontend == j) { 
00477               int len = ntohs(pkt->content_length);
00478               char *p = ((char *) pkt) + 20;
00479               memcpy(pdata, p, len);
00480               if((len % 10) != 0) printf("board %d: content_length = %d !\n", i, len);
00481               pdata += len;
00482             }
00483           }
00484         }
00485 
00486         bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00487       }
00488     }
00489 // }
00490 
00491   forgetPackets();
00492       
00493   return SUCCESS;
00494 }
